articles.title: Pyongyang branch of ISKS established
articles.content:
Pyongyang branch of ISKS established 
    Pyongyang, December 11 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang branch of the International Society for Korean Studies (ISKS) was established with due ceremony on December 10.
 Present there were Kim Se Min, vice-president of the academy of social sciences, officials concerned and members of the delegation of the ISKS led by vice-chairman Ri Son Han.   
 Speeches were made at the ceremony and staff members of the branch including its chairman and vice-chairman were elected.
